greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is of the form 2^i - 2^j with i >= j, and 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: (PARI) A340375(n) = if(n<5, 1, n>>=valuation(n, 2); n++; n>>valuation(n, 2)==1); \\ From standalone function "is" given in A023758
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 06 2021
